message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a good starting point.

I'm sticking with my previous offer. 60-40 is still a fair split, even with the inflation. Let's not let this go on forever.

I'm still holding firm at 60-40.  We're both losing money with each round, so let's cut this short.  I'm not going to budge any further.
